item.title: About
item.description: I’m Kaushik Lakshman. I’m a data scientist currently working at Betfair Australia. I hail from Bangalore, India but currently live in Melbourne, Australia. This is a collection of some stuff that I like to do in my spare time. You can find me on the following places: Github Twitter LinkedIn
